mapper.select: select CC.course_num, CC.user_num, CC.star, CC.content, CC.cafe_num, CC.writeday, U.nickname from comment_course CC INNER JOIN user U ON CC.user_num=U.user_num where cafe_num=#{cafe_num}
select ifnull(round(avg(star),1),0) from comment_course where cafe_num=${cafe_num}
